other_title: 金色のコルダ セコンド・パッソ (Japanese)
plot: Hino Kahoko continues to improve her skills at the Seiso Academy participating in music competitions with the help of Lili, the music fairy, the students from the music department, and a new blond charming character.
ending_theme: "蒼穹のスコア ～The score in blue～" by Stella Quintet +
